references.paper_title: Mastering Atari, Go, chess and shogi by planning with a learned model
references.reason: This paper introduces MuZero, a state-of-the-art model-based reinforcement learning algorithm used as a key agent in the experiments, significantly impacting the results.

references.paper_title: Thinker: Learning to plan and act
references.reason: This paper introduces the Thinker agent and its associated world model, both of which are central to the experimental methodology and findings of the current paper.

references.paper_title: IMPALA: Scalable distributed deep-RL with importance weighted actor-learner architectures
references.reason: This paper introduces the IMPALA agent, a key agent used in the study, whose performance characteristics are compared against other agents, significantly influencing the results.
This paper introduces the DRC agent, a key agent in the study, whose performance and internal mechanisms are compared against other approaches.

references.paper_title: Goal misgeneralization in deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper provides crucial background on the potential for misaligned objectives in RL agents, a critical context for the current paper's focus on safety and predictability.
